contents:
321 The FBI/DOJ Knows Who The Pipebomber Is. They're Just Waiting For The Statute Of Limitation To Run Out Before They Leak It. posted 2 days ago by perma-maga 17 comments award share download report block
17 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save CleanUpPhillyTrump24 10 points 2 days ago No SOL for treason and/or sedition fren. They have all the time in the world. permalink award report block reply War_Hamster 3 points 2 days ago We will need to see a lot of the corruption exposed and charged prior to the midterms. permalink parent award report block reply borisborscht 1 points 2 days ago two more weeks permalink parent award report block reply War_Hamster 1 points 1 day ago We've got the Florida grand jury in January, so two more months. permalink parent award report block reply SpellingContable 1 points 2 days ago read SOL as Trump Term 2. permalink parent award report block reply Taylor3006 7 points 2 days ago TIL that acts of terrorism against the people of the USA, have statutes of limitations.... If you planted a bomb, there is no statute of limitations. If you threatened to plant a bomb, then it is 8 years. permalink award report block reply War_Hamster 4 points 2 days ago Not to mention they're going to bring conspiracy charges in that Florida grand jury. Every act to further a conspiracy resets the SOL clock. permalink parent award report block reply InfinitesimalOrange 5 points 2 days ago I don't have limitations. permalink award report block reply Trooph-Hurts 3 points 2 days ago Sitting in the evidence is a crime! That is a conspiracy to deny justice…… all charges stand and includes govt officials!…. All go to jail…. Fck them permalink award report block reply mty_green_go 3 points 2 days ago it's not a pipe bomber. Dude planted two inactive pipes with timers imitating bombs. he's a faux-pipebomber. permalink award report block reply ShitFromShinola 3 points 2 days ago This is what happens when you have a street-shitter LARPing as senior law enforcement. Face it, all he really cares about is getting his undersized anteater spit-shined on the FBI's private jet on date night. permalink award report block reply SnowSnake 2 points 2 days ago Great mental image. Thanks 🫥 permalink parent award report block reply bobbybadass 2 points 1 day ago I'm sure it will all be handled in 2 weeks. permalink award report block reply Prandogolio 2 points 2 days ago It's already leaked permalink award report block reply SnowSnake 1 points 2 days ago His name was Robert Paulson. permalink award report block reply SanityGumby 0 points 2 days ago There is no statute of limitations on any crimes tied to this. You are low iq permalink award report block reply
